attributes.comment:
I would just like to say that I'm in disagreement with the price increase for the
Immigration and Naturalization Befefit application and petition or docket #2006-
0044. International adoptions are so costly as it is, and waiting periods continue
to increase for China adoptions as well as other countries. This forces the
potential parents to submit these applications and fees a second time due to the
application expiring before we are able to travel to adopt our children. This in turn
adds another large expense on top of the others we have already incurred. Please
help us give loving homes to orphans around the world by reconsidering this price
increase.

Sincerely,
Misty Rushing
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Misty Rushing
